entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Hazy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
